author: agilliland
msg: add convenience method to check if the currently logged in user is an admin.

author: kahatlen
msg: Make JDBC.assertUnorderedResultSet() work on empty result sets.

author: jwaldman
msg: Add AFStartPadding alias which has padding 8px on the left side in ltr languages and on the right side in rtl languages.
It's the opposite of the AFEndPadding alias we already have. It may be useful for people to have a constant padding.
